name: Ken Satoh
content: Ken Satoh's Home Page Ken Satoh I am the director of Center for Juris-Informatics in the Joint Support-Center for Data Science Research (ROIS-DS), Japan. Contact Information: Surface Mail Address: Center for Juris-Informatics, Chiyoda-ku, 2-1-2, Hitotsubashi, Tokyo 101-8430, Japan Tel: +81-3-4212-2000 Fax: +81-3-3556-1916 E-mail: ksatoh at nii.ac.jp Home Page: http://research.nii.ac.jp/~ksatoh I am currently investigating juris-informatics (aiming at amalmagation of informatics and law, as bio-informatics amalmagates informatics and biology). You can find my publications about juris-informatics here. I am a member of steering committee of JURISIN workshops (International Workshop on Juris-informatics), JURISIN 2007, JURISIN 2008, JURISIN 2009, JURISIN 2010, JURISIN 2011, JURISIN 2012, JURISIN 2013, JURISIN 2014, JURISIN 2015, JURISIN 2016. JURISIN 2017, JURISIN 2018, JURISIN 2019, JURISIN 2020, JURISIN 2021, JURISIN 2022, JURISIN 2023, JURISIN 2024 and JURISIN 2025 Anyone who are interested in the area are very welcome to join our research group. Research interests Juris-informatics Logical Foundation of Artificial Intelligence Nonmonotonic Reasoning Preference-based Reasoning Logic Programming Case-based Reasoning Machine Learning Discovery Science Software Engineering Multi-Agent Systems Multimedia Retrieval List of Publications (as of January 1, 2025) If you are interested in any papers below, please send a request to: "ksatoh at nii.ac.jp". I will send the papers to you by email within 24 hours.
